parameters: \C[\V[6]]What will I need to do today?
\C[\V[7]]When is the minister going to visit us?
I'm good. Thank you for your concern.
My name is Alfred and I will be your personal
advisor to help you with whatever you need.
So feel free to ask me anything. I will try to
help you as best I can.
\C[\V[6]]What will I need to do today?
Today you will have to make a decision that
you think will contribute the most to the
island's growth and benefit the population.
You can do this by filling out the decisions
form at your table. Keep in mind that you
cannot go back after you make a decision.
I have to say that you should always consult
Maria and Laura before making decisions.
They will report how our financial situation is
and how the population feels, which will help
in choosing the best decisions to make.
Thank you, Alfred. I will keep that in mind.
\C[\V[7]]When is the minister going to visit us?
The Minister will visit us in May, that is,
the day after you make your fourth decision.
I'll be here whenever you need me.

This morning one report has arrived.
A researcher from your company has found out that Gaia has a
hotspot of thermal energy coming from the earth! He
suggested a geothermal plant on the area to produce power.
The bad news is that it would block some city
expansion plans for roads to travel around the island and
it'd make it difficult for you to travel to your house at
the end of the day...those roads would really help!
Accordingly, I can think of two solutions.

Accordingly, I can think of two solutions.

while also capturing and utilizing the methane gas produced
during the decomposition process to create energy.

This morning one report has arrived.
It appears that the desalinization plant used by the city to
convert sea water into drinkable water for the population is
starting to have problems in terms of the energy powering
Coal has been getting expensive, and the design has been
obsolete for some time, which makes the operating costs too
Due to this the city has asked us to renew the power plant,
prefferably by implementing a renewable energy source,
Accordingly, I can think of two solutions.

Accordingly, I can think of two solutions.

Solar energy can be harnessed to power desalination
processes. Photovoltaic panels can generate electricity to
operate the desalination plant, or solar thermal systems can
provide the heat required for distillation.

decision! We don't have enough money for it!

non-renewable energy sources to power desalination plants,
providing flexibility and potential energy diversification.
